snippet: The Institute for Supply Management said its October reading was slightly lower than in September, but the employment index improved to its highest in seven months.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its services index eased to 54.2 in October from 55.1 in September; measure of employment rises to its highest since March, at 54.9 from 51.1.
lead_paragraph: The Institute for Supply Management said its October reading was slightly lower than in September, but the employment index improved to its highest in seven months.

headline.main: Service Sector Growth Eases, but Hiring Is at 7-Month High
headline.print_headline: Service Sector Growth Eases, But Hiring Is at 7-Month High
